titleStmt.title: The famous ratketcher with his trauels into France, and of his returne to London. To the tune of the Iouiall tinker.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By W. White] for Iohn Trundle, and are to be sold at the signe of the No-body in Barbican,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Part 2 has woodcut illustrations at head, and caption title reading: The ratketchers returne out of France to London. To the same tune.".
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the No-body in Barbican
